departments.name: Tennis & Junior Programs
departments.description: Oversees all tennis programming including adult and junior lessons, leagues, drills, and tournaments.

departments.name: Fitness & Personal Training
departments.description: Manages fitness classes, personal training programs, and gym operations.

departments.name: General Management, Billing & Leagues
departments.description: Handles membership billing, league coordination, facility management, and general inquiries.

hiring.description: We are looking for enthusiastic tennis instructors to join our team.
Seeking certified personal trainers and group fitness instructors.
